Event Text: Your mechanic says your car needs a $300 repair to stay safe. Do you fix it now or delay it?
A client offers you a weekend freelance job that pays well but takes up your free time. Do you accept?
You see a jacket on sale that you don't need but really like. Do you buy it?
Your credit card bill is due. You can pay the full amount or just the minimum. What do you do?
Your bus is delayed and you're running late. You can take a rideshare instead. What do you choose?
You're shopping and see a premium brand version of your usual item. Do you upgrade?
You received a small bonus at work. Do you put it into your emergency fund?
Your streaming service renews this month. Do you keep it or cancel?
Do you want spotify premium even though you have Apple Music?
